TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

span.span: Provides data for the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件可用于自定义 （或所有者描述） 的外观对详细信息视图中的控件。The event enables you to customize (or owner-draw) the appearance of a control in the details view. 事件由引发控制其属性设置为`true`及其属性设置为。The event is raised by a control when its property is set to `true` and its property is set to . 传递到事件处理程序所包含的有关的信息绘制，并可以帮助你绘制子项的方法。The passed to the event handler contains information about the to draw and also provides methods to help you draw the subitem. 使用或属性，以检索有关要绘制的子项的父项的信息。Use the or properties to retrieve information about the parent item of the subitem to draw. 若要检索本身，请使用属性。To retrieve the itself, use the property. 使用属性，以检索表示在其中显示子项的列的标头。Use the property to retrieve the representing the header of the column in which the subitem is displayed. 使用属性以执行指定的区域中，实际的绘图属性。Use the property to do the actual drawing within the area specified by the property. 若要绘制标准元素不需要自定义项，使用， ，和方法。To draw standard elements that do not need customization, use the , , and methods. 使用当你想要绘制子项的操作系统时，属性。Use the property when you want the operating system to draw the subitem. 当你想要自定义仅特定子项时，这非常有用。This is useful when you want to customize only specific subitems. > [!NOTE] > 为了避免在所有者绘制，重写时，图形闪烁问题控件并设置属性`true`。To avoid issues with graphics flickering when owner drawing, override the control and set the property to `true`. 当你的应用程序调用时，此功能才可用仅在 Windows XP 和 Windows Server 2003 系列上方法。This feature is available only on Windows XP and the Windows Server 2003 family when your application calls the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何提供自定义方式绘制控件。The following code example demonstrates how to provide custom drawing for a control. 在示例中的控件具有渐变背景。The control in the example has a gradient background. 与负值子项具有红色的前景色和背景为黑色。Subitems with negative values have a red foreground and a black background. 处理程序事件绘制整个项的背景。A handler for the event draws the background for entire items. 处理程序事件绘制的文本值以及文本和背景具有负值的子项。A handler for the event draws the text values and both the text and background for subitems that have negative values. 处理程序事件绘制每个列标题。A handler for the event draws each column header. A组件提供一种方法的详细信息视图和列表视图之间切换。A component provides a way to switch between the details view and the list view. 在列表视图中，仅激发事件。In the list view, only the event is fired. 在这种情况下，文本和背景均在事件处理程序。In this case, the text and background are both drawn in the event handler. [!code-csharp[ListViewOwnerDraw#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListViewOwnerDraw/CS/listviewownerdraw.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ListViewOwnerDraw#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListViewOwnerDraw/VB/listviewownerdraw.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性指定的位置是相对于窗口左上角控件。The location specified by this property is relative to the upper-left corner of the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性中的应用程序提供的自定义绘制控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property in an application that provides custom drawing for a control. 在示例中，处理程序事件绘制子项文本值以及文本和背景具有负值的子项。In the example, a handler for the event draws the subitem text values and both the text and background for subitems that have negative values. 有关完整示例，请参阅概述参考主题。For the complete example, see the overview reference topic. MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void DrawBackground() cil managed

summary.span: 使用 的当前背景色绘制它的背景。

span.span: Draws the background of the using its current background color.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法来绘制使用的当前值标准背景属性。Use this method to draw a standard background that uses the current value of the property. 绘制背景来填充指定的区域属性。The background is drawn to fill the area specified by the property. > [!NOTE] > 的父属性必须设置为`false`以防止重写子项值的父项的值。The property of the parent must be set to `false` to prevent the value of the parent item from overriding the subitem value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法中的应用程序提供的自定义绘制控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method in an application that provides custom drawing for a control. 在示例中，处理程序事件绘制子项文本值以及文本和背景具有负值的子项。In the example, a handler for the event draws the subitem text values and both the text and background for subitems that have negative values. 有关完整示例，请参阅概述参考主题。For the complete example, see the overview reference topic. [!code-csharp[ListViewOwnerDraw#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListViewOwnerDraw/CS/listviewownerdraw.cs#4)] [!code-vb[ListViewOwnerDraw#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListViewOwnerDraw/VB/listviewownerdraw.vb#4)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否应由操作系统绘制而不是由所有者描述 。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the should be drawn by the operating system instead of owner-drawn.

value.span: 如果该子项应由操作系统绘制，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the subitem should be drawn by the operating system; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 处理时使用此属性不想要自定义的子项的事件。Use this property when handling the event for subitems that you do not want to customize. 如果将此属性设置为`true`，通常使用的当前值绘制子项， ，和属性If you set this property to `true`, the subitem will be drawn normally using the current values of the , , and properties > [!NOTE] > 的父属性必须设置为`false`以防止重写子项值的父项的值。The property of the parent must be set to `false` to prevent the value of the parent item from overriding the subitem value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`ListView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `ListView1`. 然后，确保与事件处理程序事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#472](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#472)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#472](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#472)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void DrawFocusRectangle(valuetype System.Drawing.Rectangle bounds) cil managed

span.span: The area within which to draw the focus rectangle.

summary.span: 如果父级 具有焦点，则为 绘制一个聚焦框。

span.span: Draws a focus rectangle for the if the parent has focus.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法用于标准周围绘制聚焦框子项。Use this method to draw a standard focus rectangle around the subitem. 焦点矩形位于指定的区域内绘制一个像素`bounds`参数。The focus rectangle is drawn one pixel inside the area specified by the `bounds` parameter. 仅当父项具有焦点，因此不需要检查项的焦点状态，然后才能调用此方法时对其是绘制。It is drawn only when the parent item has focus, so you do not need to check the focus state of the item before you call this method. 你可能想要周围绘制聚焦框仅第一个子项 （即，父项，显示在第一列） 而不是在每个子项周围绘制它。You might want to draw the focus rectangle only around the first subitem (that is, the parent item, which is displayed in the first column) rather than drawing it around every subitem of an item. 这对应于的正常行为控制属性设置为`false`。This corresponds to the normal behavior of a control when the property is set to `false`. 若要绘制聚焦框的第一个子项，调用方法时，才值为 0。To draw the focus rectangle around the first subitem, call the method only when the value is 0. 控件不提供能够选择各个子项，但如果你想要自己实现子项选择，可以使用此方法来周围绘制聚焦框以外的第一个子项。The control does not provide the ability to select individual subitems, but if you want to implement subitem selection yourself, you can use this method to draw the focus rectangle around a subitem other than the first one.

summary.span: 使用 的当前前景色和默认格式设置绘制它的文本。

span.span: Draws the text of the using its current foreground color and the default formatting.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void DrawText() cil managed

summary.span: 使用 的当前前景色绘制它的文本。

span.span: Draws the text of the using its current foreground color.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法使用的当前值的子项文本绘制和属性。Use this method to draw the subitem text using the current values of the and properties. 在指定的区域内绘制文本属性。The text is drawn within the area specified by the property. > [!NOTE] > 的父属性必须设置为`false`以防止和重写的子项值的父项的值。The property of the parent must be set to `false` to prevent the and values of the parent item from overriding the subitem values.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void DrawText(valuetype System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags flags) cil managed

span.span: A bitwise combination of values.

summary.span: 使用 的当前前景色以及由指定的 值设置的格式绘制它的文本。

span.span: Draws the text of the using its current foreground color and formatting it with the specified values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法使用的当前值的子项文本绘制和属性。Use this method to draw the subitem text using the current values of the and properties. 在指定的区域内绘制文本属性。The text is drawn within the area specified by the property. 中指定的值`flags`参数让你提供格式设置属性，节点标签，如文本对齐方式。The values specified in the `flags` parameter let you provide formatting properties for the node label, such as text alignment. > [!NOTE] > 的父属性必须设置为`false`以防止和重写的子项值的父项的值。The property of the parent must be set to `false` to prevent the and values of the parent item from overriding the subitem values. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法中的应用程序提供的自定义绘制控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method in an application that provides custom drawing for a control. 在示例中，处理程序事件绘制子项文本值以及文本和背景具有负值的子项。In the example, a handler for the event draws the subitem text values and both the text and background for subitems that have negative values. 有关完整示例，请参阅概述参考主题。For the complete example, see the overview reference topic. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性用于访问的父级绘制。Use this property to access the parent of the to draw. 这非常有用属性未提供足够信息以满足你的需求。This is useful when the property does not provide adequate information to meet your needs. 属性提供了你可以使用，例如，若要确定是选择、 选中，还是已设定焦点的父项的基本状态信息。The property provides only basic state information that you can use, for example, to determine whether the parent item is selected, checked, or focused. 属性，另一方面，允许您访问所有成员的父级。The property, on the other hand, allows you to access all members of the parent . 访问正在绘制，使用属性。To access the being drawn, use the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`ListView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `ListView1`. 然后，确保与事件处理程序事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性检查是否的父级绘制处于特定状态。Use this property to check whether the parent of the to draw is in a particular state. 此属性提供有关父项的基本状态信息。This property provides only basic state information about the parent item. 此属性，例如，可用于确定是选择、 选中，还是已设定焦点的父项。You can use this property, for example, to determine whether the parent item is selected, checked, or focused. 如果你需要知道的详细信息，检索通过父项属性并直接检查其属性。If you need to know more, retrieve the parent item through the property and check its properties directly. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性中的应用程序提供的自定义绘制控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property in an application that provides custom drawing for a control. 在示例中，处理程序事件绘制子项文本值以及文本和背景具有负值的子项。In the example, a handler for the event draws the subitem text values and both the text and background for subitems that have negative values. 有关完整示例，请参阅概述参考主题。For the complete example, see the overview reference topic. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当此方法很有用的其他属性不会提供足够信息以满足你的需求。This method is useful when the other properties do not provide adequate information to meet your needs. 属性允许你访问的所有成员进行绘制。The property allows you to access all members of the being drawn. 你必须直接访问此对象，例如，若要绘制值自己一点，而不是使用方法。You must access this object directly, for example, to draw the value yourself rather than using the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性中的应用程序提供的自定义绘制控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property in an application that provides custom drawing for a control. 在示例中，处理程序事件绘制子项文本值以及文本和背景具有负值的子项。In the example, a handler for the event draws the subitem text values and both the text and background for subitems that have negative values. 有关完整示例，请参阅概述参考主题。For the complete example, see the overview reference topic.
